title: Types Of Machine Learning | Machine Learning Algorithms | Machine Learning Tutorial | Simplilearn
excerpt: Machine Learning helps you build models that can make predictions and take decisions of their own. This video on Types of Machine Learning and Algorithms will make you understand what Machine Learning is and the various types of Machine Learning. You will learn about Supervised, Unsupervised, and Reinforcement
